idea: A place where you will get the best professional help regarding your speech and hearing related issues across age group. Experienced and trained professional are ready to provide in clinic as well as online guidance to patients to overcome communication issues.
name: Speakiepedia

idea: The company is designing and engineering the Electric scooter in India. It is made in India/ Vocal for local. The company aims to “go electric in the current climate due to the twin advantages of no emissions and a considerably reduced operating cost and the ease of charging with removable battery and portable charger”. It has innovative features like Intelligent turning, Stability control, anti-roll back, Torque-based Riding Modes, regenerative braking, Sine wave FOC controller, IP 68 waterproof design battery, IP 67 waterproof design Motor, has smart BMS, provides highest safety, battery designed for advanced thermal management , has high power NMC cells which is designed to dissipate heat from the core of the pack to the surface, having removable battery which can be charged anywhere, has IOT technology like vehicle live tracking, ride statistics, Battery SOC –Sate of charge and DTE- Distance to empty, real time vehicle diagnostics, find my Charging Station and Service Station, time to full charge and dynamic thermal management. It also has battery pairing with vehicle. It has encrypted CAN communication and Roll over sensor, Limp-Home feature and Health Check- Safe to Start. The company has hired professionals to build this kind of the technology. This technology will in turn generate sales and will generate employment for the mass. It will cater the segments like Medical Diagnostic Pathology; instant delivery service; E Commerce delivery; milk, grocery, medical, food, courier delivery; Two-Wheeler Taxi. So we believe on “You can speed up, ride fast and win all the races in the world but memories can be made only on this innovation.”The Government initiatives have acted as a catalyst to the development of the sector and will address the apprehensions of the manufacturers, sellers, and customers. All these factors - policies, quality and availability of vehicles - will increase the adoption of EVs and the government will continue to offer them a boost by implementing policies that offer fiscal and non-fiscal incentives.
name: BGAUSS AUTO PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are an end-to-end service gifting company specializing in gift design for corporate, events, client appreciation, and life’s special occasions. We have a dedicated team that helps understand your exact need, and helps you select the right products based on your specific needs, and customize them as per your requirement. We are also selling AutoParts & Kitchen items on ecommerce platforms like Amazon and Meesho.
name: THE MIX BAG

idea: Built technology-enabled businesses from scratch to scale. Currently focused on gaining traction for his startup focused on devices for health screening.
name: ADARSA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Green Swan technologies is launching a brand - Ellora. Through Ellora, we aim to solve for sustainability and give a platform and promote Indian art and crafts. using the Indian craft sensibilities, we aim at presenting a modern design to the audience. 

Green Swan is also developing and employing AI technologies for developing a prediction model for fashion and the latest trends. The reason behind this being the objective of minimising the wastage / pile up of merchandise.
name: Green Swan Technologies Private Limited

idea: FutureSavvy is an EduTech company, focussed on delivering interactive and  challenge-driven learning in advance and future-ready skills such as Blockchain, Cybersecurity and IoT.
name: futuresavvy

idea:
Eagle Hawk Logistics Pvt. Ltd., is committed to serve the customers by offering complete transportation services. We have a computerized monitoring system to keep track of the fleet to ensure increased efficiency and timely delivery of your goods.

The company was established by two energetic entrepreneurs with more than 15 years of experience in the Logistics Industry and passionate belief of transforming lives through transportation.

Eagle Hawk Logistics Pvt.Ltd. deals with a large fleet of trucks and trailers and many more attached vehicles to ensure safe delivery. We operate through our Regional offices across India. We provide affordable prices & excellent service round the clock for transporting your valuable goods.

To deliver the best and beyond expectations we do offer value added services to our customers.
name: EAGLE HAWK LOGISTICS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
1) Design, Manufacturing , Import,Export ,Installation of Cold Chain, Temperature Controlled Warehouse, Ripening Chamber, Climate Control Greenhouse, Polyhouse, Shade net House,

2) Manufacturing, Import,Export of New Growing Vertical Farming System,Smart Hydroponic System Led Grow Light and Accessories
name: BELLMONTE INDUSTRIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
One step Print LLP is a Mumbai based, ISO 9001:2015 certified full-suite Commercial & Packaging Printing service provider. With our full-scale, in-house printing & Packaging facility, we are very well attuned to handle the printing needs of any Business, irrespective of its size. We have cemented our position as one of the most Leading Printing service providers in the industry.We manufacture a variety of folded cartons, such as Mono cartons, Met Pet cartons, etc. One Step Print LLP is one of the leading carton manufacturers and folding carton manufacturers in India.

We cater to the domestic local as well as export markets across various countries all over the world.

With us, everything is in-house.

We understand the struggle to manage your multiple printing needs. As a rapidly expanding business, you cannot afford to waste time addressing your different printing needs.
name: ONE STEP PRINT LLP

idea: TO CARRY ON THE BUSINESS OF MANUFACTURING, TRADE, IMPORT, EXPORT PF LIVE CHIKEN, FRESH & FROZEN CHIKEN & CHIKEN PRODUCTS, CHIKENS READY TO EAT PRODUCTS, CHIKENS TABLE EGGS & EGGS POWDER, MILK & MILK PRODUCTS, POULTRY FEEDS, POULTRY FEEDS RAW MATERIALS, POLTRY MEDICINE & MINERALS, CATTLE FEED, CATTLE FEEDS RAW MATERIALS, POULTRY FARMS & CATTLE FARMS EQUIPMENT.
